description:
A commitment to sanctuary state policies is a commitment to disregarding federal immigration laws, despite how many Americans this puts at risk. So while the federal government is currently committed to deporting criminal aliens, the same cannot be said for the City of Boston.

Boston Mayor Michelle Wu doubled down on this promise at the State of the City.

Michelle Wu, Mayor of Boston, reaffirms her position to protect criminal illegal aliens in her city:

"We stand with immigrants, you belong here. Boston doesn't back down-- if you come for one of us, you will get all of us." pic.twitter.com/duEyJVWKhp
— Libs of TikTok (@libsoftiktok)
title: Boston Mayor reaffirms just how committed her city is towards being FOR the illegal immigrants

description:
Under the guise of being so incredibly inclusive and tolerant, one leftist has complained to a Washington State City Council and implied that flying the Prisoner of War flag during June is nothing but a “political stunt.” And given how this comment should be totally condemned, the mayor said what needed to be said.

NEW: Washington state mayor obliterates LGBTQ activist during a city meeting after she compared the Pride flag to a Prisoner of War-Missing in Action flag.

🔥🔥

Activist: "There's been 82,000 Americans who are registered as POWs or MIAs... but there's 20 million minimum LGBTQ… pic.twitter.com/xgagFCi0Tr
— Collin Rugg (@CollinRugg)
title: Mayor annihilates LGBTQ activist who attempts to compare the POW flag to the Pride flag

description:
AOC and Bernie Sanders, two of the most Progressive Democrats in America are pathetically fighting a form of “oligarchy” that does not exist, in a bizarre attempt to make AOC the new face of the DNC.

As of writing this, the pair has traveled to at least several locations, including Arizona and Nevada. In both her rants, she attempts to portray her radical policy stances as nothing but common sense, despite the American people sending a message that they want nothing to do with everything she claims to stand for.

In Arizona, she claimed that she wanted to live in an “America where you have free speech to express yourself and not be afraid of being put on a lis
title: 2028 Democrat frontrunner Rep. AOC tells a Bernie rally she is pro-free speech, but we have receipts...
